abstract: Joanna Smith Rakoff reviews book A Small Hotel by Robert Olen Butler.
snippet: Instead of signing her divorce papers, a woman checks into the New Orleans hotel “thick with the ghosts” of her marriage.
lead_paragraph: Instead of signing her divorce papers, a woman checks into the New Orleans hotel “thick with the ghosts” of her marriage.

headline.main: The Death of a Marriage in New Orleans
headline.seo: A Small Hotel - By Robert Olen Butler - Book Review
